code: import axios from'axios';import{BASE_URL2}from'../constantes/urls';import{goToHome}from'../routers/cordinator';export var login=function login(body,clear,history,setIsLoading){setIsLoading(true);axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL2,"/user/login"),body).then(function(res){localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.token);clear();goToHome(history);setIsLoading();}).catch(function(err){setIsLoading(false);alert(err.response.data.message);});};export var signup=function signup(body,clear,history,setIsLoading){setIsLoading(true);axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL2,"/user/signup"),body).then(function(res){localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.token);clear();goToHome(history);}).catch(function(err){setIsLoading(false);alert(err.response.data.message);});};
